item.title: Red Hill Groves
item.dc:creator: justincox
item.description:
Looking for a sweet treat in orange and vanilla swirl ice cream? How about navel oranges as big as softballs for $0.33 a piece? Maybe it’s fresh-squeezed orange juice you seek? All of these amazing things, and more can be obtained from the Red Hill Groves on Conway. Red Hill Groves is an Orlando classic; […]

The post Red Hill Groves appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
item.content:encoded:
Looking for a sweet treat in orange and vanilla swirl ice cream? How about navel oranges as big as softballs for $0.33 a piece? Maybe it’s fresh-squeezed orange juice you seek? All of these amazing things, and more can be obtained from the Red Hill Groves on Conway.

Red Hill Groves is an Orlando classic; it’s been open every citrus season since 1962. While in season the grove store offers extremely fresh citrus and a ton of other treats. Plus, if you’re looking to send a little Florida sunshine to your frozen family members up north, they can do that too.

Next time you’re on Conway, be sure to stop in at the grove store and, at the very least, pick up an orange and a ice cream. You’ll be very happy you did.

The post Red Hill Groves appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
